alert.note: Alert for Mississippi (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 15 at 9:32PM CST until February 15 at 9:45PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MISSISSIPPI...WESTERN TIPTON...SOUTHWESTERN LAUDERDALE AND NORTH CENTRAL SHELBY COUNTIES... At 931 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dixonville, or near Meeman Shelby Forest State Park, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Millington, Osceola, Wilson, Marie, Fulton, Dixonville, Gilt Edge, Burlison, Evadale, Driver, Grider, Quito, Golden Lake, Carson Lake, Rotan, Randolph, Sloanville, St Thomas, Shawnee and Delpro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CST for eastern Arkansas...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
